form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Grassley (for himself and Mr. Nelson) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to empower individuals with disabilities to establish their own supplemental needs trusts.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Special Needs Trust Fairness Act of 2015.

section.header: Fairness in Medicaid supplemental needs trusts

subsection.text: Section 1917(d)(4)(A) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1396p(d)(4)(A)) is amended by inserting the individual, after for the benefit of such individual by.
The amendment made by subsection (a) shall apply to trusts established on or after the date of the enactment of this Act.
